channel.description: Free settling, job finding and banking information for newcomers.

item.title: Thought leadership on immigration, economy, and housing are key goals for Rebekah Young
item.dc:creator: Stephen Tustin
item.description:
Newcomers, the economy and Canada’s housing crisis are top-of-mind issues for Rebekah Young in her new and unique role at Scotiabank. Named as the bank’s first head of Inclusion and Resilience Economics, Young’s mission is to provide thought leadership on inclusive economic growth that ensures higher productivity gains translate into improved well-being that is shared broadly… read more

The post Thought leadership on immigration, economy, and housing are key goals for Rebekah Young appeared first on Prepare For Canada.

item.title: Canadian Job Market in 2023 Remains Strong for Newcomers
item.dc:creator: Stephen Tustin
item.description:
For newcomers arriving in Canada looking for jobs, the good news is that the country’s labour market added 104,000 jobs in December. This surprise marks the third decline in the unemployment rate in four months, bringing it closer to the record-low of 4.9 percent reached in June and July. Job trend shows no sign of… read more

The post Canadian Job Market in 2023 Remains Strong for Newcomers appeared first on Prepare For Canada.

item.title: Teacher Jobs in Canada | Everything Newcomers Need to Know
item.dc:creator: Prepare For Canada
item.description:
Teacher jobs in Canada are desirable career paths for locals and newcomers moving to the country. The education system is one of the best in the world. The teacher salary in Canada is also one of the highest in the world. However, most provinces and territories have a shortage of qualified teachers, and they are… read more

The post Teacher Jobs in Canada | Everything Newcomers Need to Know appeared first on Prepare For Canada.
